name: Unlikely Place
description:
Explore an overgrown alien island as a scouting druid trying to decide if it is suited for human settlement or not.

Utilize your Jet-pack, Flashlight, Scanner, Meditation, Solar Power Cells and Planting Utility to reach every corner of the interconnected Island.

Unlikely Place features a Dynamic Day & Night cycle as well as truly nonlinear exploration based game-play.

The Game was created as a roughly two Month Student Project at the MD.H in Munich, Germany. Further Development is currently on hold. If a new version gets released it will be added here.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • M - Meditate (speeds up time)
  • F - Toggle Flashlight On & Off
  • Tab - Toggle Scan Mode On & Off
  • Left Click - Scan/Interact
  • Left Shift - Jet-pack (press again for emergency boost if empty)
  • Q -Take Seedling (visible in bottom Right corner)
  • E - Plant Seedling (only in open undamaged Pots
  • T - Teleport back to Dropship
  • B - Open Database
  • K - Open Choice Menu (Warning point of no return upon choice!)
  • R -hold for Emergency Jetpack Refuel (only necessary at low Power levels)

Disclaimers

There is currently no way to check the controls during play. Read them in the main menu before playing or refer back to the description on the Page here.

The Game does not feature a safe system in its current state.
